Text:
@thorhammer - Do you have any way I can contact you privately? Email or whatever? I can pass on to you the knowledge of how to get these editions.

Given you once were the supplier of these - I know I can trust you to reliably spread the love to others. I'll see what I can do about 21-33. Shouldn't be too hard, just tedious - so I'll upload in one go as one massive torrent file as opposed to 13. It'll take some time (coupled with my otherwise busy schedule) - so check back some time next week.

Hi raymond_u - many thanks for this. My email address is johnatcross ampersand gmail.com (if you see what I mean - I'm just trying to avoid it being collected by the spammers). It would be really useful to have a source for these - I don't mind uploading to TPB (my previous source dried up before which is why I stopped uploading).
thor - do you mean johnatcross (at) gmail.com? Rather than "ampersand" which is actually this symbol: "&"

welcome back raymond_u. Have been missing your quality uploads of this pub.
 Many thanks

GR8 UP
TankX


Demoniod we will surely miss you RIP
